Categories: There was a problem loading the reviews. [ Try again ](#) Spread across 7 acres of tropical greenery, Nature Lanka Ayurveda Health Resort features directs access to Tangalle Beach. It features an outdoor pool and a spa with customized Ayurvedic treatments. Rooms feature a wooden four-poster bed with netting and a fan. Tea/coffee making amenities and an attached bathroom with heated shower facilities are also available. Guests can relax in the herbal sauna or cooling mud hut. The property also organizes yoga and meditation sessions. Western dishes and traditional Ayurvedic meals are on offer at the restaurant. Room service is available. Resort Nature Lanka is a 3-hour drive from Bandaranaike International Airport. Car hire service can be provided.
